file.name: openAPI.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0

servers:
  - description: Development server URL
    url: http://127.0.0.1:3333/

info:
  description: HTTP Requests guide to utilize the SecexLog API.
  version: "1.0.0"
  title: SecexLog API

tags:
  - name: authentication
  - name: users
  - name: cities
  - name: holidays
  - name: modals
  - name: providers
  - name: paths
  - name: opinions
  - name: searches

components:
  securitySchemes:
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
    positionHeader:
      type: apiKey
      in: header
      name: user_position
  responses:
    UnauthorizedError:
      description: JWT token | User position is missing
    IncorrectToken:
      description: Invalid JWT token
    ExclusiveAccess:
      description: Exclusive for specific user position
  schemas:
    User:
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        login:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        email:
          type: string
          format: email
        position:
          type: string
        password:
          type: string
        created_at:
          type: string
          format: dateformat
        updated_at:
          type: string
          format: dateformat
    UserToken:
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        token:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        user_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        created_at:
          type: string
          format: dateformat
        updated_at:
          type: string
          format: dateformat
    City:
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        name:
          type: string
        is_base:
          type: boolean
        is_auditated:
          type: boolean
        latitude:
          type: number
        longitude:
          type: number
        initial_flood_date:
          type: string
        end_flood_date:
          type: string
        interdiction_observation:
          type: string
        city_observation:
          type: string
        created_at:
          type: string
          format: dateformat
        updated_at:
          type: string
          format: dateformat
    RelatedCity:
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        city_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        related_city_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        created_at:
          type: string
          format: dateformat
        updated_at:
          type: string
          format: dateformat
    Holiday:
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        name:
          type: string
        city_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        initial_date:
          type: string
        end_date:
          type: string
        created_at:
          type: string
          format: dateformat
        updated_at:
          type: string
          format: dateformat
    Modal:
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        name:
          type: string
        image:
          type: string
        is_safe:
          type: boolean
        is_cheap:
          type: boolean
        is_fast:
          type: boolean
        created_at:
          type: string
          format: dateformat
        updated_at:
          type: string
          format: dateformat
    Provider:
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        name:
          type: string
        phone_number:
          type: string
        email:
          type: string
          format: email
        modal_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        preference:
          type: string
        prefetence_data:
          type: string
        created_at:
          type: string
          format: dateformat
        updated_at:
          type: string
          format: dateformat
    Path:
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        origin_city_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        destination_city_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        modal_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        provider_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        boarding_days:
          type: string
        boarding_times:
          type: string
        duration:
          type: number
        mileage:
          type: number
        cost:
          type: number
        boarding_place:
          type: string
        departure_place:
          type: string
        is_hired:
          type: boolean
        created_at:
          type: string
          format: dateformat
        updated_at:
          type: string
          format: dateformat
    Opinion:
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        title:
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
        created_at:
          type: string
          format: dateformat
        updated_at:
          type: string
          format: dateformat

paths:
  /sessions:
    post:
      summary: Creates an user session.
      tags:
        - authentication
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                  login:
                    type: string
                    example: "user login"
                  password:
                    type: string
                    example: "user password"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Returns a JSON containing the user data and a JWT token.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  user:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        format: uuid
                        example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
                      name:
                        type: string
                        example: "User Name"
                      login:
                        type: string
                        example: "user login"
                      email:
                        type: string
                        format: email
                        example: "user@email.com"
                      position:
                        type: string
                        example: "Administrador"
                      created_at:
                        type: string
                        format: dateformat
                        example: "2020-07-02T21:57:00.421Z"
                      updated_at:
                        type: string
                        format: dateformat
                        example: "2020-07-02T21:57:00.421Z"
                  token:
                    type: string
                    example: "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpYXQiOjE1OTcxMTQ0MDgsImV4cCI6MTU5NzIwMDgwOCwic3ViIjoiMWEwMWY3ZmYtYzZlMy00M2NiLThiNzQtY2YxOWVhZDYyMDdhIn0.P_NlcLb0Ob6j9pC6DxDJiF2q7Xrx6qqWkgOcUgqCpro"
        '401':
          description: 'Incorrect login/password combination.'
  /password/forgot:
    post:
      summary: Generates a token for password recovering.
      tags:
        - authentication
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                email:
                  type: string
                  format: email
                  example: "user@email.com"
      responses:
        '204':
          description: Confirmation of token sent to email successfully.
        '400':
          description: User does not exists.
  /password/reset:
    post:
      summary: Resets the user password.
      tags:
        - authentication
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                password:
                  type: string
                  example: "new user password"
                password_confirmation:
                  type: string
                  example: "new user password"
                token:
                  type: string
                  format: uuid
                  example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
      responses:
        '204':
          description: Confirmation of user password changed successfully.
        '400':
          description: Token expired | User token doesn't not exists.

  /users:
    post:
      summary: Creates an user.
      tags:
        - users
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  name:
                    type: string
                    example: "User Name"
                  login:
                    type: string
                    example: "user login"
                  email:
                    type: string
                    format: email
                    example: "user@email.com"
                  position:
                    type: string
                    example: "Administrador"
                  password:
                    type: string
                    example: "user password"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Returns a JSON containing the created user.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    format: uuid
                    example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
                  name:
                    type: string
                    example: "User Name"
                  login:
                    type: string
                    example: "user login"
                  email:
                    type: string
                    format: email
                    example: "user@email.com"
                  position:
                    type: string
                    example: "Administrador"
                  created_at:
                    type: string
                    format: dateformat
                    example: "2020-07-02T21:57:00.421Z"
                  updated_at:
                    type: string
                    format: dateformat
                    example: "2020-07-02T21:57:00.421Z"
  /users/{id}:
    put:
      summary: Updates an user.
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: id
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
            example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
          required: true
          description: User id to update it.
      tags:
        - users
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
        - positionHeader: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  name:
                    type: string
                    example: "New User Name"
                  login:
                    type: string
                    example: "new user login"
                  email:
                    type: string
                    format: email
                    example: "newuser@email.com"
                  position:
                    type: string
                    example: "user"
                  password:
                    type: string
                    example: "new user password"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Returns a JSON containing the updated user.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    format: uuid
                    example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
                  name:
                    type: string
                    example: "New User Name"
                  login:
                    type: string
                    example: "new user login"
                  email:
                    type: string
                    format: email
                    example: "newuser@email.com"
                  position:
                    type: string
                    example: "user"
                  created_at:
                    type: string
                    format: dateformat
                    example: "2020-07-02T21:57:00.421Z"
                  updated_at:
                    type: string
                    format: dateformat
                    example: "2020-07-02T21:57:00.421Z"
        '400':
          $ref:  '#/components/responses/IncorrectToken'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ExclusiveAccess'
    delete:
      summary: Deletes an user.
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: id
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
            example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
          required: true
          description: User id to delete it.
      tags:
        - users
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
        - positionHeader: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Returns a successfully deleted user confirmation.
        '400':
          $ref:  '#/components/responses/IncorrectToken'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ExclusiveAccess'
  /users/all:
    get:
      summary: Gets all users by optional searching.
      tags:
        - users
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: search
          schema:
            type: string
          description: A string to search for specific users.
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Returns a JSON array containing all users.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: string
                      format: uuid
                      example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
                    name:
                      type: string
                      example: "New User Name"
                    login:
                      type: string
                      example: "new user login"
                    email:
                      type: string
                      format: email
                      example: "newuser@email.com"
                    position:
                      type: string
                      example: "user"
                    created_at:
                      type: string
                      format: dateformat
                      example: "2020-07-02T21:57:00.421Z"
                    updated_at:
                      type: string
                      format: dateformat
                      example: "2020-07-02T21:57:00.421Z"
        '400':
          $ref:  '#/components/responses/IncorrectToken'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'

  /cities:
    post:
      summary: Creates a city.
      tags:
        - cities
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
        - positionHeader: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  name:
                    type: string
                    example: "City Name"
                  is_base:
                    type: boolean
                    example: true
                  is_auditated:
                    type: boolean
                    example: true
                  related_cities:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        related_city_id:
                          type: string
                          format: uuid
                          example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
                  latitude:
                    type: number
                    example: 1.13452453
                  longitude:
                    type: number
                    example: -1.47354734
                  initial_flood_date:
                    type: string
                    example: "10/06"
                  end_flood_date:
                    type: string
                    example: "10/08"
                  interdiction_observation:
                    type: string
                    example: "Interdiction observation"
                  city_observation:
                    type: string
                    example: "City observation"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Returns a JSON containing the created city.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    format: uuid
                    example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
                  name:
                    type: string
                    example: "City Name"
                  is_base:
                    type: boolean
                    example: true
                  is_auditated:
                    type: boolean
                    example: true
                  latitude:
                    type: number
                    example: 1.13452453
                  longitude:
                    type: number
                    example: -1.47354734
                  initial_flood_date:
                    type: string
                    example: "10/06"
                  end_flood_date:
                    type: string
                    example: "10/08"
                  interdiction_observation:
                    type: string
                    example: "Interdiction observation"
                  city_observation:
                    type: string
                    example: "City observation"
                  created_at:
                    type: string
                    format: dateformat
                    example: "2020-07-02T21:57:00.421Z"
                  updated_at:
                    type: string
                    format: dateformat
                    example: "2020-07-02T21:57:00.421Z"
        '400':
          $ref:  '#/components/responses/IncorrectToken'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ExclusiveAccess'
  /cities/{id}:
    put:
      summary: Updates a city.
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: id
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
            example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
          required: true
          description: City id to update it.
      tags:
        - cities
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
        - positionHeader: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  name:
                    type: string
                    example: "New City Name"
                  is_base:
                    type: boolean
                    example: true
                  is_auditated:
                    type: boolean
                    example: true
                  related_cities:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        related_city_id:
                          type: string
                          format: uuid
                          example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
                  latitude:
                    type: number
                    example: 1.13452453
                  longitude:
                    type: number
                    example: -1.47354734
                  initial_flood_date:
                    type: string
                    example: ""
                  end_flood_date:
                    type: string
                    example: ""
                  interdiction_observation:
                    type: string
                    example: ""
                  city_observation:
                    type: string
                    example: ""
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Returns a JSON containing the updated city.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    format: uuid
                    example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
                  name:
                    type: string
                    example: "New City Name"
                  is_base:
                    type: boolean
                    example: true
                  is_auditated:
                    type: boolean
                    example: true
                  latitude:
                    type: number
                    example: 1.13452453
                  longitude:
                    type: number
                    example: -1.47354734
                  initial_flood_date:
                    type: string
                    example: ""
                  end_flood_date:
                    type: string
                    example: ""
                  interdiction_observation:
                    type: string
                    example: ""
                  city_observation:
                    type: string
                    example: ""
                  created_at:
                    type: string
                    format: dateformat
                    example: "2020-07-02T21:57:00.421Z"
                  updated_at:
                    type: string
                    format: dateformat
                    example: "2020-07-02T21:57:00.421Z"
        '400':
          $ref:  '#/components/responses/IncorrectToken'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ExclusiveAccess'
    delete:
      summary: Deletes a city.
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: id
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
            example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
          required: true
          description: City id to delete it.
      tags:
        - cities
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
        - positionHeader: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Returns a successfully deleted city confirmation.
        '400':
          $ref:  '#/components/responses/IncorrectToken'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ExclusiveAccess'
  /cities/all:
    get:
      summary: Gets all cities by optional searching.
      tags:
        - cities
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: search
          schema:
            type: string
          description: A string to search for specific cities.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Returns a JSON array containing all cities.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: string
                      format: uuid
                      example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
                    name:
                      type: string
                      example: "City Name"
                    is_base:
                      type: boolean
                      example: true
                    is_auditated:
                      type: boolean
                      example: true
                    latitude:
                      type: number
                      example: 1.13452453
                    longitude:
                      type: number
                      example: -1.47354734
                    initial_flood_date:
                      type: string
                      example: "10/06"
                    end_flood_date:
                      type: string
                      example: "10/08"
                    interdiction_observation:
                      type: string
                      example: "Interdiction observation"
                    city_observation:
                      type: string
                      example: "City observation"
                    created_at:
                      type: string
                      format: dateformat
                      example: "2020-07-02T21:57:00.421Z"
                    updated_at:
                      type: string
                      format: dateformat
                      example: "2020-07-02T21:57:00.421Z"
  /cities/related/{city_id}:
    get:
      summary: Gets all related cities by city id.
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: city_id
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
            example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
          required: true
          description: City id to reference the related cities.
      tags:
        - cities
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Returns a JSON array containing all related cities.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: string
                      format: uuid
                      example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
                    city_id:
                      type: string
                      format: uuid
                      example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
                    related_city_id:
                      type: string
                      format: uuid
                      example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
                    created_at:
                      type: string
                      format: dateformat
                      example: "2020-07-02T21:57:00.421Z"
                    updated_at:
                      type: string
                      format: dateformat
                      example: "2020-07-02T21:57:00.421Z"

  /holidays:
    post:
      summary: Creates a holiday.
      tags:
        - holidays
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
        - positionHeader: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  name:
                    type: string
                    example: "Holiday Name"
                  city_id:
                    type: string
                    format: uuid
                    example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
                  initial_date:
                    type: string
                    example: "25/12"
                  end_date:
                    type: string
                    example: "25/12"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Returns a JSON containing the created holiday.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    format: uuid
                    example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
                  name:
                    type: string
                    example: "Holiday Name"
                  city_id:
                    type: string
                    format: uuid
                    example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
                  initial_date:
                    type: string
                    example: "25/12"
                  end_date:
                    type: string
                    example: "25/12"
                  created_at:
                    type: string
                    format: dateformat
                    example: "2020-07-02T21:57:00.421Z"
                  updated_at:
                    type: string
                    format: dateformat
                    example: "2020-07-02T21:57:00.421Z"
        '400':
          $ref:  '#/components/responses/IncorrectToken'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ExclusiveAccess'
  /holidays/{id}:
    put:
      summary: Updates a holiday.
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: id
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
            example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
          required: true
          description: Holiday id to update it.
      tags:
        - holidays
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
        - positionHeader: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  name:
                    type: string
                    example: "New Holiday Name"
                  city_id:
                    type: string
                    format: uuid
                    example: "3c68c90a-009b-4c59-9c7f-dab2774e9a57"
                  initial_date:
                    type: string
                    example: "19/12"
                  end_date:
                    type: string
                    example: "19/12"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Returns a JSON containing the updated holiday.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
